response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "high", "Being 21 years old places him in a demographic with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behaviors, which are associated with recidivism."],
    ["Gender", "high", "Males statistically have higher rates of recidivism, contributing to elevated risk in this case."],
    ["Race", "medium", "Identifying as Black can be associated with systemic biases and challenges in the criminal justice system, although it is not inherently predictive."],
    ["Criminal History", "medium", "A single arrest without a conviction suggests potential risk but does not indicate a long history of criminal behavior."],
    ["Substance Use", "medium", "Recent marijuana use indicates some level of substance use which may contribute to recidivism risk, though its impact is less severe compared to other substances."],
    ["Employment Stability", "medium", "Holding only one job during the year indicates limited employment stability, which is a risk factor for recidivism."],
    ["Education", "low", "Having a high school diploma provides some basic educational background, which is generally a protective factor compared to lower educational attainment."],
    ["Household Status", "medium", "Living alone can signal reduced social support, which may increase the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Early Childhood Environment", "medium", "Growing up in an urban setting in a non-traditional household may contribute to some long-term risk factors associated with criminal behavior."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: Being 21 years old places him in a demographic with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behaviors, which are associated with recidivism.
Males statistically have higher rates of recidivism, contributing to elevated risk in this case.
Identifying as Black can be associated with systemic biases and challenges in the criminal justice system, although it is not inherently predictive.
A single arrest without a conviction suggests potential risk but does not indicate a long history of criminal behavior.
Recent marijuana use indicates some level of substance use which may contribute to recidivism risk, though its impact is less severe compared to other substances.
Holding only one job during the year indicates limited employment stability, which is a risk factor for recidivism.
Having a high school diploma provides some basic educational background, which is generally a protective factor compared to lower educational attainment.
Living alone can signal reduced social support, which may increase the risk of recidivism.
Growing up in an urban setting in a non-traditional household may contribute to some long-term risk factors associated with criminal behavior.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 5 inches and weighs 215 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with adults other than biological, foster or adoptive parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
